Stojković: Strah velikih utakmica, moramo da naučimo šta znači odgovornost
„Jeftino smo primili golove“, smatra kapiten Partizana

07 Nov 2019

Dvomeč sa Mančester junajtedom je završen. Ostaće na kraju uspomena na beogradski duel u kome je Partizan bio ravnopravan, na trenutke bolji tim, dok će ovaj sa Old Traforda želeti crno-beli što pre da zaborave.
Prvo, zbog rezultata (0:3), a odmah zatim i zbog broja prilika koje su dozvolili Crvenim đavolima.„Teško je kad izgubiš, pogotovo ovakvu utakmicu, od protivnika koji je na visokom nivou i igra u kvalitetnoj ligi. Jeftino smo primili golove, moramo odgovornije da delujemo u pojedinim situacijama, naučimo šta znači odgovornost i kako izgleda braniti svoj gol. Mogli smo za nijansu više od ovoga, da izbacimo strah od velikih utakmica. Opet, ovaj nivo je veliki za nas. Očekujem da popravimo utisak protiv Alkmara“, predočio je posle gostovanja u Engleskoj Vladimir Stojković.
Kapiten crno-belih jeste savladan triput, ali je bar još toliko golova spasao. To što je večeras branio dobro na kraju se ne vidi na semaforu.„Kad sanjam ovakve utakmice, sanjam da se pozitivno završe. Da smo bili malo koncentrisaniji, mogli smo duže da buduemo u igri i da ih duže mučimo. Rezultat se piše, ali očekujem pobedu u Holandiji“, dopunio je Stojković.

Stojkovic: Fear of big matches, we have to learn what responsibility means
"We got goals cheap," says Partizan captain

07 Nov 2019

The bout with Manchester United is over. Remaining at the end will be the memory of the Belgrade duel in which Partizan was equal, for a moment a better team, while the one from Old Traford will want black and white to forget as soon as possible.
First, because of the result (0: 3), and then because of the number of opportunities they allowed the Red Devils. We have received goals cheaply, we need to act more responsibly in certain situations, learn what responsibility means and what it looks like to defend our goal. We could have shaded more than this to dispel the fear of big matches. Again, this level is big for us. I expect that we will improve our impression against Alkmaar, "Vladimir Stojkovic said after his visit to England.
The Black and Whites captain was beaten three times, but he saved at least as many goals. What he defended well tonight is not at the end of the scoreboard. If we were a little more concentrated, we could have been in the game longer and tortured them longer. The result is being written, but I expect a win in the Netherlands, ”Stojkovic added.
